tool.name: SAGA.shapes_points.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayPOLYGONS False isArrayFIELD False output_data_CLIPS $output_data_CLIPS name SAGA.shapes_points.8 POINTS $POINTS POLYGONS $POLYGONS FIELD $FIELD METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLIPS $OutputSection_CLIPS.outputType_CLIPS transmissionMode_CLIPS $OutputSection_CLIPS.transmissionMode_CLIPS

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Add Attribute to Clipped Points
param.help: Add Attribute to Clipped Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLIPS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CLIPS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
